title: Kinda Funny Forums Are Now Live!
description:
Sign up for the forums now! www.kindafunny.com/forums

Watch the FULL Kinda Funny Live Here! https://youtu.be/2uJBDk0mFF4






Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: when I first started working at Kinda Funny I never thought it would actually become a thing from the very beginning Kinda Funny was designed to be very positive, very engaging, but also remarkably fun to be a part of. Our goal was to create the most amazing and unique community the world has ever seen, and that's exactly what we did with the Kinda Funny Forums. One of the things that makes the Kinda Funny Forum so incredible is its stunningly simple design. We stripped away all of the clutter by gifting you three undeniably perfect discussion forums: Kinda Funny Discussion, Video Games Discussion, and General Discussion. With those astonishingly diverse options, why talk about anything else? People often ask, if a tree falls in the forest and no one is there to hear it, does it make a sound? Well, we ask, if a new Star Wars trailer comes out and you can't talk to your friends about how awesome it was, did it even happen? No, but now, now you'll never need to worry about that again because

well we ask if a new Star Wars trailer comes out and you can't talk to your friends about how awesome it was did it even happen no but now now you'll never need to worry about that again because you can always talk to your friends about it whenever you want on the Kinda Funny Forums. Accessible, relevant, unparalleled, inspired, fundamentally important. You can log in, you can post words, pictures. Really, it's just like any other internet forum, but it's better because it's ours. When we first told you about the Kinda Funny Forums, I was excited and nothing's changed. Does it work on mobile? Yeah. Yeah, desktop? Yeah. The browser on your PlayStation? If you plug it into dial-up using one of those super bulky network adapters, I'm not sure, but why wouldn't it? We believe the Kinda Funny Forums are going to revolutionize the Kinda Funny Community, giving the greatest people on Earth the greatest place to become best friends is only the beginning, and we can't wait to see where you take us. The kind of

to revolutionize the Kinda Funny Community, giving the greatest people on Earth the greatest place to become best friends is only the beginning, and we can't wait to see where you take us. The Kinda Funny Forums, making the best community in the world Kinda Better.
